name: 劉碩雅
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Reading & Writing	     Listening & Speaking 
1	Introduction	     
2	Unit 6: p. 100-101	     Unit 6: p. 94-97
3	Unit 6: p. 102-104	     Unit 6: p. 98-101
4	Unit 6: p. 107 p.115   Unit 6: p. 107-108
5	Unit 7: p. 124-125	     Unit 7: p. 112-117
6	Unit 7: p. 128-129	     Unit 7: p. 118-121
7	Unit 7: p. 133 p.138   Unit 7: p. 126-130
8	Mid-term Examination   
9	English Proficiency Test 
10	Unit 8: 146-147	     Unit 8: 132-136
11	Unit 8: 149-150	     Unit 8: 137-138
12	Unit 9: 167-169	     Unit 9: 152-157
13	Unit 9: 171-172	     Unit 9: 157-158
14	Unit 10: 188	     Unit 10: 174-177
15	Unit 10: 189	     Unit 10: 178-179
16	Review 
17	Final Examination	
18	English Proficiency Test	English Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
期中會考 15%
期末會考 15%
期中考 21%
期末考 28%
出席率 7%
課堂小考 14%
materials:
1. NorthStar 3: Reading and Writing (3rd Edition)
2. NorthStar 3: Listening and Speaking  (3rd Edition)
